resources.string:
Welcome to Bsociable. 
Take a quick tour to see 
what you can do with 
Bsociable.
Invite your friends to \nBsociable and start \ncreating events
Create unlimited events with groups \nand friends and send the relevant \ninformation, every time.
View the group or friends availability
A dot under the date indicates that \nsome in the group has \nanother commitment.

Add a profile photo, set your dietary 
preferences and sync your default 
calendar to keep your friends 
up to date on your 
availability.
